overview: When the mother of two little girls is hospitalized for exhaustion, the family's adventurous father takes them on a trip to the Norwegian forests. But while hiking, he falls into a crevice and is unable to free himself. The two girls must make their own journey through the forest to seek help. Meanwhile, they have to face their fears.
tagline: The road comes when we get lost
title: Sisters: The Summer We Found Our Superpowers
